Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?

I've been experiencing week-long episodes of headaches every four weeks for the last year, along with lower abdominal pain and breast tenderness during these episodes. I also feel quite irritable at these times.

Yes, they start just before my menstrual period.
Final Diagnosis: Premenstrual Syndrome (PMS)
